meanings.definition: The state of possessing intelligence far surpassing that of humans.
meanings.sent1: Scientists predict that in the future, superintelligences may revolutionize the way we live.
meanings.sent2: Many science fiction stories explore the concept of superintelligences from other planets.
meanings.sent3: The superintelligences in the movie were so advanced that they solved complex problems in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a superintelligences, able to process information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The idea of superintelligences is both fascinating and a bit intimidating.

meanings.definition: A being or entity with intelligence exceeding that of humans.
meanings.sent1: The scientist claimed to have created a superintelligences in his lab.
meanings.sent2: The alien race was rumored to possess superintelligences beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The superintelligences at the zoo amazed visitors with their ability to communicate with humans.
meanings.sent4: The superintelligences of the future may hold the key to solving complex global issues.
meanings.sent5: The superintelligences in the story were portrayed as both powerful and benevolent.
